content: back over the top of right needle ready to knit the next st if you are a visual learner you may wish to look up a video pattern the toe using judy s magic cast on cast on 8 sts on to both the front needle and the back needle 16 sts cast on in total the cast on tail will mark the beginning of the round or the start of the front needle you will now work the sock using the magic loop method knit 1 round knitting the stitches on the second needle through the back loop to untwist them increase round round 1 kfb k to last st 2sts on front needle kfb k1 repeat on back needle 4 stitches increased round 2 knit 1 round repeat these two rounds 7 more times or until you have 22 sts on each needle 44 sts total the foot knit until 17 5 19 20 cm from toe or until 5cm less than your foot s length optional we changed colour after about 5 row for a contrast toe 2 designed by emily bolduan © maker maker 2019 the heel if you are unsure about knitting the heel this is a good point to add in a lifeline see techniques knit across front needle the heel will now be worked on the back needles stitches only optional change colour here if you would like a contrast heel row 1 rs k22 turn your work r9 1ds k14 turn row 2 ws 1ds p21 turn work r10 1ds p13 turn r3 1ds k20 turn r11 1ds k12 turn r4 1ds p19 turn r12 1ds p11 turn r5 1ds k18 turn r13 1ds k10 turn r6 1ds p17 turn r14 1ds p9 turn r7 1ds k16 turn r15 1ds k8 turn r8 1ds p15 turn r16 1ds p7 turn now you will work the second half of the heel when you get to a double stitch work it as if it is one single stitch kind of like a knit 2 together the double stitches are easy to spot because of their x-like like appearance you will also be stacking ds s on top of other ds s and finally pay attention to the last few row of this section as the instruction changes it s easy to get carried away row 1 rs 1ds k8 turn r10 1ds p17 turn row 2 ws 1ds p9 turn r11 1ds k18 turn r3 1ds k10 turn r12 1ds p19 turn r4 1ds p11 turn r13 1ds k20 turn r5 1ds k12 turn r14 sl 1 p21 turn r6 1ds p13 turn *r15 sl 1 k21 do not turn r7 1ds k14 turn *if working a contrasting heel work r8 1ds p15 turn r15 change back to mc k21 do not turn r9 1ds k16 turn you should have 22 sts on each needle at this stage it is a good idea to try your sock on 3 designed by emily bolduan ©
